00049   EUDAQEventBuilder::EUDAQEventBuilder() : Processor("EUDAQEventBuilder")
00050   {
00051     _description = "Processor to built events from raw EUDAQ slcio files";
00052 
00053     registerProcessorParameter("InputCollectionName",
00054                                "Name of the input collection of EUDAQ raw data",
00055                                _inputColName,
00056                                std::string("EUDAQDataScCAL"));
00057     
00058     registerProcessorParameter("InputCollectionNameTemp",
00059                                "Name of the input temperature collection",
00060                                _inputColNameTemp,
00061                                std::string("TempSensor"));
00062 
00063    registerProcessorParameter("DetectorType",
00064                                "Name of the Detector",
00065                                _detectorTypeName,
00066                                std::string(""));
00067 
00068     registerProcessorParameter("OutputCollectionNameECAL",
00069                                "Name of the ouput collection of the sorted events for the ECAL ",
00070                                _outputColNameECAL,
00071                                std::string("EUDAQDataECAL"));
00072 
00073     registerProcessorParameter("OutputCollectionNameHCAL",
00074                                "Name of the ouput collection of the sorted events for the HCAL ",
00075                                _outputColNameHCAL,
00076                                std::string("EUDAQDataHCAL"));
00077     
00078   }

00089 
00090   void EUDAQEventBuilder::processEvent(LCEvent* evt){
00091   
00092 
00093     int runNumber  = evt->getRunNumber();//airqui
00094     int Timestamp ;//
00095         
00096     int read[9];
00097     rawData blockData;
00098                   
00099     int temp[10];
00100     rawTemp blockTemp;
00101 
00102     std::map< int, std::vector<rawData> > rData;        
00103     std::vector<rawTemp>  rTemp;       
00104     std::map<int, int> nHitsPerChipMap;//Map for number of hits per Chips
00105     IntVec nHitsPerChip;//vector to store the number of hits per Chips per event
00106  
00107     LCCollection* col ; //data collection
00108     LCCollection* colTemp ; //temp collection
00109 
00110     try
00111       {
00112         //fetch EUDAQ data unsorted collection
00113         col = evt->getCollection( _inputColName ) ;
00114 
00115         const std::vector<std::string> *cnames = evt->getCollectionNames();
00116 
00117         Timestamp= col->getParameters().getIntVal("Timestamp_i");//TimeStamp();//airqui
00118 
00119         for(int ielm = 0; ielm < col->getNumberOfElements(); ielm++)
00120           {
00121             
00122             LCObject *obj = col->getElementAt(ielm);
00123             EUDAQBlock lBlock(obj);
00124             
00125             read[0] = lBlock.GetCycleNr();
00126             read[1] = lBlock.GetBunchXID();
00127             read[2] = lBlock.GetChipID();
00128             read[3] = lBlock.GetEvtNr();
00129             read[4] = lBlock.GetChannel();
00130             read[5] = lBlock.GetTDC();
00131             read[6] = lBlock.GetADC();
00132             read[7] = lBlock.GetHitBit();
00133             read[8] = lBlock.GetGainBit();
00134             
00135             streamlog_out(DEBUG4) <<"  read SLCIO "<<lBlock.GetCycleNr()<<" "<<lBlock.GetEvtNr()<<" "<<lBlock.GetBunchXID()<<" "<<lBlock.GetChannel()<<" "<<lBlock.GetChipID()<<" "<<lBlock.GetTDC()<<" "<<lBlock.GetADC()<<" "<<lBlock.GetHitBit()<<" "<<lBlock.GetGainBit()<<endl;//airqui
00136             
00137             blockData.iCyNr = read[0];
00138             blockData.iBxID = read[1];
00139             blockData.iCpID = read[2];
00140             blockData.iEvNr = read[3];
00141             blockData.iChan = read[4];
00142             blockData.iTDC  = read[5];
00143             blockData.iADC  = read[6];
00144             blockData.iHBit = read[7];
00145             blockData.iGBit = read[8];
00146             
00147             
00148             streamlog_out(DEBUG4) <<"  CycleNr: "<<read[0] <<" BXID: "<<read[1] <<" ChipID: "<<read[2]<<"  Channel: " <<read[4] << std::endl;
00149 
00150 
00151             rData[read[1]].push_back(blockData);
00152           }
00153 
00154         streamlog_out(DEBUG4) <<" rData.size(): "<<rData.size() << endl;        
00155 
00156         temperaturecollection_write = false;
00157 
00158         for(unsigned cnamesindex = 0; cnamesindex< cnames->size(); cnamesindex++) {
00159           if(cnames->at(cnamesindex)==_inputColNameTemp) 
00160             temperaturecollection_write = true;
00161         }
00162 
00163         if(temperaturecollection_write == true){
00164 
00165           //fetch EUDAQ temperature data collection
00166           colTemp= evt->getCollection( _inputColNameTemp) ;
00167           temperaturecollection_write = true;
00168 
00169           for(int ielm = 0; ielm < colTemp->getNumberOfElements(); ielm++)
00170             {
00171               //i:LDA;i:port;i:T1;i:T2;i:T3;i:T4;i:T5;i:T6;i:TDIF;i:TPWR
00172        
00173               LCObject *obj = colTemp->getElementAt(ielm);
00174               EUDAQTempSensorBlock tBlock(obj);
00175 
00176               temp[0] = tBlock.GetLDANumber();
00177               temp[1] = tBlock.GetPortNumber();
00178               temp[2] = tBlock.GetT1();
00179               temp[3] = tBlock.GetT2();
00180               temp[4] = tBlock.GetT3();
00181               temp[5] = tBlock.GetT4();
00182               temp[6] = tBlock.GetT5();
00183               temp[7] = tBlock.GetT6();
00184               temp[8] = tBlock.GetTDIF();
00185               temp[9] = tBlock.GetTPWR();
00186 
00187         
00188               blockTemp.iLDANumber = temp[0];
00189               blockTemp.iPortNumber = temp[1];
00190               blockTemp.iT1 = temp[2];
00191               blockTemp.iT2 = temp[3];
00192               blockTemp.iT3 = temp[4];
00193               blockTemp.iT4 = temp[5];
00194               blockTemp.iT5 = temp[6];
00195               blockTemp.iT6 = temp[7];
00196               blockTemp.iTDIF = temp[8];
00197               blockTemp.iTPWR = temp[9];
00198 
00199        
00200               rTemp.push_back(blockTemp);
00201 
00202               streamlog_out(DEBUG4) <<" temperature      LDA: "<<temp[0] <<" port: "<<temp[1] <<" T1: "<<temp[2]<<"  TPWR: " <<temp[9] << std::endl;
00203             }
00204         }
00205 
00206 
00207       }
00208 
00209     catch (  DataNotAvailableException err )
00210       {
00211         //      cout <<  "RootTreeGenerator3 WARNING: Collection "<< _inputColName
00212         //           << " not available in event "<< evt->getEventNumber() << endl;
00213         return;
00214       }
00215 
00216    
00217 
00218    // **********************************************************
00219     //  Processing data
00220     //  build events according to the different BunchXID
00221     //  within one CycleNr, and remove them,
00222     //  until all collected data have been asigned to an event.
00223     //  If TempSensor collection is found, add it to the last event of the readoutcycle.
00224     // **********************************************************
00225       
00226 
00227     for(map< int, vector<rawData> >::iterator it=rData.begin(); it!=rData.end();it++ )
00228       {
00229         
00230         //streamlog_out(MESSAGE)<< " ===== EUDAQEventBuilder processing Event "<< LcioEventNr <<"  ======" << endl;
00231         LCEventImpl*  evt_new = new LCEventImpl() ;
00232         
00233         LCCollectionVec *colTemp2= new LCCollectionVec( LCIO::LCGENERICOBJECT );
00234 
00235         LCCollectionVec *colECAL = new LCCollectionVec( LCIO::LCGENERICOBJECT );
00236         LCCollectionVec *colHCAL = new LCCollectionVec( LCIO::LCGENERICOBJECT ); 
00237         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < it->second.size(); i++ )
00238           {
00239             int iBxID = it->second.at(i).iBxID;
00240             int iCyNr = it->second.at(i).iCyNr;
00241             int iCpID = it->second.at(i).iCpID;
00242             int iEvNr = it->second.at(i).iEvNr;
00243             int iChan = it->second.at(i).iChan;
00244             int iTDC  = it->second.at(i).iTDC;
00245             int iADC  = it->second.at(i).iADC;
00246             int iHBit = it->second.at(i).iHBit;
00247             int iGBit = it->second.at(i).iGBit;
00248             
00249             
00250             EUDAQBlock * lBlock = new EUDAQBlock(iCyNr, iBxID, iCpID, iEvNr, iChan,
00251                                                  iTDC, iADC, iHBit, iGBit);
00252 
00253             if(nHitsPerChipMap.count(iCpID) == 0)
00254               nHitsPerChipMap[iCpID] = 0;
00255 
00256             if(iHBit == 1)
00257               nHitsPerChipMap[iCpID]++;
00258             
00259             if (iCpID>=129 && iCpID<=140)
00260               colECAL->addElement( lBlock );
00261             else
00262               colHCAL->addElement( lBlock );
00263             
00264           }
00265         
00266         
00267         LcioEventNr++; //Event start from 1.
00268         evt_new->setRunNumber(  runNumber  ) ;
00269         evt_new->setEventNumber( LcioEventNr ) ;
00270         evt_new->setDetectorName( _detectorTypeName);
00271 
00272         LCTime evttime( Timestamp ) ;//
00273         
00274         evt_new->setTimeStamp( evttime.timeStamp()  ) ;
00275 
00276         nHitsPerChip.clear();
00277         for(map<int, int>::iterator it2 = nHitsPerChipMap.begin(); it2 != nHitsPerChipMap.end(); ++it2)
00278           {
00279             if(it2->second != 0)
00280               nHitsPerChip.push_back(it2->first*100+it2->second);
00281           }
00282         nHitsPerChipMap.clear();
00283 
00284         streamlog_out(DEBUG0)<<"--------------- Writing Event Parameters -------------------" <<endl;
00285         streamlog_out(DEBUG0)<<"BXID: "<< it->first <<endl;
00286         streamlog_out(DEBUG0)<<"HitPerChips: "<< nHitsPerChip.size() << endl;
00287 
00288         //add event parameter
00289         evt_new->parameters().setValue("BXID", it->first);
00290         evt_new->parameters().setValues("nHitsPerChip", nHitsPerChip);
00291 
00292         evt_new->addCollection( colECAL, _outputColNameECAL );
00293         evt_new->addCollection( colHCAL, _outputColNameHCAL );
00294 
00295         //if temperature collection is in the readoutcycle, save it in the first built event
00296         if( temperaturecollection_write==true) {
00297 
00298           for (unsigned int i = 0; i < rTemp.size(); i++ ) 
00299             {      
00300               EUDAQTempSensorBlock * tBlock = new EUDAQTempSensorBlock(rTemp.at(i).iLDANumber ,rTemp.at(i).iPortNumber,
00301                                                                rTemp.at(i).iT1,rTemp.at(i).iT2,rTemp.at(i).iT3,rTemp.at(i).iT4 ,rTemp.at(i).iT5 ,rTemp.at(i).iT6 ,
00302                                                                rTemp.at(i).iTDIF ,rTemp.at(i).iTPWR );
00303               colTemp2->addElement( tBlock );
00304             }
00305           evt_new->addCollection( colTemp2, "TemperatureSensor" );
00306           temperaturecollection_write=false;
00307           rTemp.clear();
00308         }
00309 
00310         ProcessorMgr::instance()->processEvent( evt_new ) ;
00311 
00312         // ------------ IMPORTANT ------------- !
00313         // we created the event so we need to delete it ...
00314         delete evt_new ;
00315 
00316       } // loop map key to save the event with each CycleNr.
00317     
00318     rData.clear();
00319 
00320     throw marlin::SkipEventException(this); 
00321 
00322   }// look into collection
00323 
00324  
00325 
00326   void EUDAQEventBuilder::end() {
00327     streamlog_out(MESSAGE) <<" ===== End of EUDAQEventBuilder processor ===== " <<  endl;
00328   }
00329   
00330 } //namespace
